Package game

Class DebugMode

java.lang.Object
game.DebugMode
public class DebugMode extends Object
DebugMode has all the methods used for debug mode of videopoker.

  • Constructor Details

    • DebugMode

      public DebugMode(int m, String d)
      Constructs DebugMode, player with money m.
      Parameters:
      m - money
      d - String with all the cards from card-file

  • Method Details

    • Commands

      public void Commands(String c)
      Creates a String array with all the commands from cmd-file and calls the methods necessary to execute them. if deal = 1, player made deal so command bet is invalid, so is deal again; if deal = 0, player made bet so command advice, bet and hold are invalid; if deal = -1, player made hold so command advice, hold and deal are invalid;
      Parameters:
      c - String with all the commands from cmd-file

    • deal

      public void deal()
      Gets 5 cards from deckOfcards and gives them to players hand. It's a different method then the one in SimulationMode because in this mode you dont need to shuffle.

    • doHold

      public void doHold(List<Integer> h)
      Replaces the cards that the player doesn't want. It's a different method then the one in SimulationMode because in this mode you dont take random cards from the deck.
      Parameters:
      h - list with the index of the cards that player wants in his hand.

    • credit

      public void credit()
      Prints the players credit.

    • result

      public void result(int name_hand)
      prints the final result of the play, the player's credit and counts how many times the player wins with a certain hand.
      Parameters:
      name_hand - integer which identifies the hand of cards the player owns

    • bet

      public void bet(int m)
      Takes the money for the bet from the player.
      Parameters:
      m - money

    • statistics

      public void statistics(double N13)
      prints the statistics table.
      Parameters:
      N13 - "theoretical returned"
